overview: Just when it seems like these friends are going to have a chill day at their buddy Luka's house, things take a naughty turn as Ryan Conner, playing Luka's irresistibly sexy mom, appears and entices her son's friends into fucking her. Not only is Ryan being vigorously fucked in the ass, she's being hardcore double penetrated from all ends. Right when you think it can't get any crazier for Luka, his gorgeous sister, played by Kasey Warner, walks in to see her mom being torn apart by her brother's friends. She is seduced into joining the others as the guys shamelessly fuck the two of them in front of their friend.  A new addition to James Deen Productions, Slutty Mom, staring James Deen, Isiah Maxwell, Tommy Pistol and Brad Knight, takes the fantasy of fucking a hot mom beyond anything you could imagine. Its thrilling scenes and fascinating twist give this fuck fest a fresh vibe that will make you want more.
title: Slutty Mom
